info.name: Metasmart API
info.description: API collection for Metasmart - Goal Management Platform. Run the 'E2E Test Sequence' folder to test all endpoints.

item.name: E2E Test Sequence
item.description: Complete end-to-end test sequence covering all major endpoints. Run this folder with Postman Collection Runner to test the entire application flow.

exec: pm.test('Response has token, email and name', function () {
// Skip tests if no file selected or Content-Type not supported
pm.test.skip('No file selected or Content-Type issue - skipping profile picture upload');
// Skip tests if Cloudinary is not configured
pm.test.skip('Cloudinary not configured - skipping profile picture tests');
pm.test('Goal created with correct data', function () {

}

exec: console.log('E2E Test Sequence (50 tests) completed successfully!');
